tooltip.terralink.esoteric_scanner: The §5Esoteric Scanner§r scans for §5Esoteric Cores§r when held. It will beep at a rate that increases the closer you are to a core.
tooltip.terralink.esoteric_core: §5Esoteric Cores§r can be found around the world and generates different resources depending on the type of core, assuming that the correct fuel and/or conditions are provided.
tooltip.terralink.energetic_esoteric_cor: §9Energetic§r §5Esoteric Cores§r will spawn basic ores in a 3x3x3 area around it when powered
